data.comment: The first-half is under way at Estadio Castelao - Flamengo kick-off to start the match.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 3, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Ceara a goal kick.
Cleber Bomfim of Ceara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 5, Ceara needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
Gabriel Barbosa for Flamengo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Throw-in Ceara.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Flamengo.
Ceara's Charles gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Flamengo advance rapidly upfield but Marielson Alves Silva blows for offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gabriel Barbosa (Flamengo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 13, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a Ceara throw-in in Flamengo's half.
In the minute 15, In Fortaleza Flamengo attack through Gabriel Barbosa. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Marielson Alves Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo's Vitinho attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Marielson Alves Silva signals a Flamengo throw-in in Ceara's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Ceara in Fortaleza.
In the minute 24, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Flamengo.
Ceara are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ceara's Fernando Sobral gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Ceara.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Vinicius Goes (Ceara) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Flamengo defenders.
In the minute 34, In Fortaleza, Vitinho of Flamengo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick Ceara.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 35, Flamengo's Michael breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Important block from the Ceara defence as Vitinho fires in a strike for Flamengo.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 43, Ricardinho for Ceara has been booked by Marielson Alves Silva and receives a first yellow card.
Gabriel Barbosa for Flamengo drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
In the minute 45, Marielson Alves Silva signals a Flamengo throw-in in Ceara's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Marielson Alves Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Marielson Alves Silva blows to start the second-half. Ceara with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Flamengo.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Flamengo's half?
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Luiz Otavio heads in to make it 1-0 at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 50, That's a fine assist from Vinicius Goes.
Marielson Alves Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Domenec Torrent Font is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Castelao with Pedro replacing Michael.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 56, Ceara take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Charles.
Vinicius Goes instrumental with a fine assist.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
In the minute 58, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Ceara push forward at Estadio Castelao and Vinicius Goes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Flamengo defence.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Ceara.
Flamengo are caught offside.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Ceara's area.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
The away team replace Thiago Maia with Diego.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
In the minute 69, Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
Ceara needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 71, Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a first substitution, with Vinicius Lima replacing Vinicius Goes.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 75, Manucho is replacing Leandro Carvalho for the home team.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 78, Flamengo's Vitinho gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Flamengo surge into the attack at Estadio Castelao but Diegoâ€™s header is off-target.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Flamengo make their third substitution with Matheus Franca replacing Mauricio Isla.
Lincoln is replacing Vitinho for Flamengo at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick in a good position for Flamengo!
In the minute 81, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ceara are whistled for offside.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Flamengo.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Ceara's area.
The home team have replaced Cleber Bomfim with Bergson. This is the third substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
In the minute 87, Martha is on a sub for Ricardinho for Ceara.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Marielson Alves Silva awards the away team a throw-in.
Ceara are pushing forward but Bergson's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
At Estadio Castelao the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a Flamengo throw-in in Ceara's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
